We are pleased to announce our October promotion.

Notice:<br>
* The Free 1GB cPanel account must be manually activated. Please drop a ticket to our team after purchase for activation.  
* This promo code applies to other KVM VPS packages. View them at http://kvm4.me  
* This promotion expire at October 31, 2015 or until supply last.

<hr>
* We accept TOR Relay on our Dedicated IPv4 VPS. Read AuP for more information
* We accept Paypal and Bitcoin (via Bitpay)
* Looking Glass: https://www.deepnetsolutions.com/faq.html
* We speak French and English. You can reach us 24/7, via the following link: http://krkn.pw/contact


Regards, David.
